tagline: Your premier destination for comfortable dormitory stays and versatile hall rentals.
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both start and end dates for your booking.
anySpecialRequests: Any special requests or additional information
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received. Please proceed with payment to OROEDU bank account and send a screenshot to @oroedubot on Telegram. Your booking will be finalized after admin approval and payment verification.
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Thank you for your booking request. We will review it shortly and get back to you with confirmation and payment details if approved.
errorSavingBooking: There was an error saving your booking. Please try again.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate the price. Please ensure item details are correct.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be before start date.
itemNotFound: The requested item could not be found.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: Failed to fetch dormitory details. Please try again.
errorFetchingDormitories: Failed to fetch dormitories. Please try again.
fillFormToBookDormitory: Fill out the form below to book your preferred dormitory room.
fillFormToBookFacility: Fill out the form below to book the selected hall or section.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompany: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
loginAsCompanyToBook: Please log in as an approved company representative to book.
pleaseSelectSectionsToBook: Please select one or more sections to book.
noSectionsSelected: No sections were selected for booking.
fillFormToBookSelectedSections: Fill out the form below to book the selected sections.
pageNotFoundMessage: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
confirmDeleteDormitoryMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this dormitory? This action cannot be undone.
viewAndManageDormitories: View and manage all registered dormitories.
searchDormitories: Search by room number or floor...
noDormitoriesFoundPleaseAdd: No dormitories found. Please add a new one.
noDormitoriesMatchSearch: No dormitories match your search criteria.
confirmDeleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
viewAndManageHallsAndSections: View and manage all halls and sections.
noHallsFoundPleaseAdd: No halls or sections found. Please add a new one.
noHallsMatchSearch: No halls or sections match your search criteria.
confirmDeleteBookingMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this booking? This action cannot be undone.
noBookingsMatchFilters: No bookings match your current filters.
noBookingsFoundAdminCta: No bookings found yet. Customer bookings will appear here.
viewAndManageAllBookings: View and manage all customer bookings.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book our facilities.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your registration has been submitted and is pending approval. We will notify you via email once reviewed.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use.
superAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible by Super Admins only.
registerAdminDescription: Create a new administrator account (requires Super Admin privileges).
adminRegisteredMessage: Admin user {email} has been successfully registered.
searchCompanies: Search by company name or email...
noCompaniesMatchSearch: No companies match your search criteria.
viewAndApproveCompanies: View and approve or reject company registrations.
adminOrSuperAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible by Admins or Super Admins only.
placeholderModernDormRoom: e.g., modern dorm room, twin beds
dormitoryIdMissing: Dormitory ID is missing from the URL.
noAvailabilityData: No availability data found for this dormitory.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to complete your booking payment.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: Please use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference/reason.
itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book a hall or section.
errorFetchingHallsAndSections: Failed to fetch halls and sections list.
yourBookingsDescription: View and manage your facility bookings.
loginAsCompanyToViewDashboard: Please log in as an approved company representative to view your dashboard.
registrationPendingMessage: Your company registration is currently under review. We will notify you via email once it's processed. Thank you for your patience.
registrationRejectedMessage: We regret to inform you that your company registration could not be approved at this time. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
contactSupportForAssistance: Please contact support for further assistance.
statusUnknownMessage: We are unable to determine the current status of your company account. Please contact support.
errorFetchingYourBookings: There was an error fetching your bookings. Please try again later.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyDashboard: This dashboard is for registered and approved company representatives. Please log in or wait for your registration approval.
selectDateRangeForReports: Select a date range to generate reports.
selectReportTypeAndDateRange: Select a report type and specify a date range.
viewOrPrintDormitoryBookingData: View or print periodic dormitory booking data.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a start and end date for the report range first.
noDataForReport: No data available for the selected report and date range.
updateYourProfileDetails: Update your profile information and password.
logoutSuccessfulMessage: You have been successfully logged out.
logoutFailedMessage: An error occurred during logout. Please try again.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement cannot be generated or viewed for this booking's current status or category.
noBookingIdProvided: No booking ID was provided in the request.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter any custom terms or modifications here. These will be appended to or replace parts of the standard agreement.
editTermsNote: Note: Changes here will be reflected in the printable agreement. Standard terms will be used if this is left blank.
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment Terms: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement, unless otherwise specified in writing. Late payments may incur additional charges.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation Policy: Cancellations made less than [X] days prior to the booking start date are subject to a [Y]% cancellation fee. Cancellations made less than [Z] days prior are non-refundable.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: Client agrees to use the facility only for the purpose stated and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. Any damage to the facility or equipment will be the responsibility of the client.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: {SITE_NAME} is not responsible for any loss, theft, or damage to personal property of the client or attendees. Client assumes all liability for activities conducted within the rented facility.
adminPaymentReferenceNote: Instruct users to make payments to this account and use their booking ID as a reference.
bankDetailsForPaymentVerification: Bank details for payment verification (for dormitory bookings).
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your booking is confirmed pending payment verification. Please send your payment proof screenshot to @oroedubot on Telegram. An admin will verify it shortly.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please contact support or try booking again.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you! Your booking request for the facility has been received and is now pending approval. We will notify you via email once it has been reviewed by our admin team.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. Check your dashboard or email for details.
companyProfileNotFound: Company profile not found. Please ensure your registration is complete.
agreementPreparationPending: Agreement is being prepared by admin.
errorMockUploadingAgreement: Error confirming signed agreement. Please try again.
agreementConfirmedAndMockUploaded: Agreement confirmed as signed. (File upload is mocked for this demo).
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page for submitting payment proof is no longer in use. Please follow the payment instructions provided for your specific booking.
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your approved dormitory booking using your phone number.
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number to search.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings.
noBookingsFoundForPhone: No approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number, or your booking is still pending.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: Dormitory {roomNumber} is currently set as unavailable by the administration. It cannot be booked at this time.
errorCheckingAvailability: An error occurred while checking availability. Please try again.
itemUnavailableConflict: {itemName} is not available for the selected dates due to a conflicting booking.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: Dormitory capacity is not configured correctly. Cannot check availability.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: All beds in {roomName} are booked for the selected dates or part of them.
duplicateBookingForPhoneOnDateError: Sorry, you cannot book twice with the same phone number for the same start date.
errorCheckingExistingBookings: An error occurred while checking for existing bookings. Please try again.
firestoreIndexRequiredError: Firestore requires a composite index for this query, but it was not found. Please contact support or check server logs for the index creation link.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: The database needs a specific setup (a composite index) to perform this check efficiently. An administrator needs to create this index in the Firebase console. Please retry after some time or contact support if the issue persists.
firestorePermissionError: Database permission error. Please contact support.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: This phone number will be used for payment verification via Telegram.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: Optional: This phone number can be used for easier communication if needed.
individualUserNote: Individual users should contact administration directly for dormitory bookings. This portal is for company facility bookings.
userDataMissingError: Login successful, but key profile data is missing. Please contact support.
weakPasswordError: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
invalidEmailFormat: The email address is not valid.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompany: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to perform this action.
searchDormitoryBookings: Search by guest name, phone, bank...
noDormitoryBookingsMatchFilters: No dormitory bookings match your current filters.
viewAndManageDormitoryBookings: View and manage all dormitory bookings.
noFacilityBookingsMatchFilters: No facility bookings match your current filters.
viewAndManageFacilityBookings: View and manage all facility bookings.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: Access Denied. You can only view agreements for bookings made by your company.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing or has not been sent by the admin.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as a company representative to view this agreement.
selectDateRangePrompt: Select a date range to check for available dormitories.
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: No dormitories available for the selected dates. Try different dates or check the 'All' tab.
selectDatesToSeeAvailableDorms: Please select a start and end date to see available dormitories for that period.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: {itemName} is currently set as unavailable by the administration. It cannot be booked at this time.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: Remember to use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference.
